synopsis.text: Naoya—a young man juggling two girlfriends, Saki and Nagisa—finds his summer vacation heating up when two more admirers enter the scene. First, there's Mirika, who boldly stole a kiss from him, and then there's Shino, harboring a secret crush on him. As they embark on a romantic escapade filled with fireworks, camping, and a trip to Okinawa, the complexities of Naoya's love life only intensify. Adding another layer to this neo-standard love comedy is the arrival of Mirika's younger sister, Risa. With summer in full swing and swimsuits galore, this season promises more laughter, romance, and excitement than ever before!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
